entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers or flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
